name: The Beat Device
description:
Ludum Dare entry page

ISSUES

  • You only need to press "r" to start once, despite what the intro says. It just takes a bit to load.
  • [Linux] "fantastic" or "beautiful" graphics settings causing crash for some users

INFLUENCES

  • noisefunge
  • cookie clicker

FUN FACTS

  • uses clojure and the Unity game engine, via Arcadia
  • due to a compiled bug in my tween library I had to eval the source at runtime (that's what "press 'r'" is doing), upside of this is you can edit the .clj files that ship with the game and press "r" to load changes. There's also a UDP repl listening on port 11211
